ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.TEXT: Hello, I am a full stack developer from Plochingen, Germany. My expertise includes front-end design using HTML, CSS and JavaScript, as well as building robust back-end systems using Django, Python and SQL - a combination that allows me to develop versatile and efficient web applications from scratch.
ABOUT.TEXT1: My personal philosophy and motto "There is always a way to a solution" guides me in every project I take on. I believe that persistence and patience combined with technical know-how and creative thinking are the key to successful code and successful projects.
ABOUT.TEXT2: In order to balance my professional work, I keep myself fit and healthy through regular exercise. This discipline and perseverance also flow into my professional ethics: There is a solution to every problem, and I am willing to invest the time necessary to find it.

SKILLS.TITLE: My skills
SKILLS.TEXT: I have grown my fullstack developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio
PORTFOLIO.TEXT: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.

PROJECTS.JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
PROJECTS.EPL: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the killer chicken

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.TEXT1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
